data.message: I don't want to install facebook messenger! It's a totally useless application and i want to receive my messages to facebook application! Stop doing changes without asking the users !

replies.message: Hi Giorgia.  We’re committed to providing a fast, reliable and fun messaging product, and we feel confident that Messenger is the way to do this going forward. We hope you'll try it and tell us what you think: http://on.fb.me/1xStQWE -Chantal

I ve installed and deleted it! It's too heavy application and it crushed all the time! I don't know the worldwide opinion of the individuals but in greece we are really disappointed and you can check it by looking the comments in posts of different web magazines!
Same as well here but I keep using the Facebook messenger. For me, so far it is good and easy use. But I don't know why it get three and stars in the app store. LOL.
